name: Squarelaxy (alpha) - Online Multiplayer Platformer + World Editor
name_original: Squarelaxy (alpha) - Online Multiplayer Platformer + World Editor
description:
Squarelaxy is an online multiplayer platformer where you can create your own worlds or just enjoy other player's creations with your friends. Customize your character and compete against other players in deathmatch and runner game modes or relax in one of the adventure worlds.

Consider joining Squarelaxy on Discord
